title: Hard to Watch: Based on the Book ‘Stone Cold Bummer’ by Manipulate
description: Tracy Jordan in his Oscar-winning role as former football star, D’Jeffrey “Lucky” Seeda. Hard to Watch: Based on the Book ‘Stone Cold Bummer’ by Manipulate.
quote: I used to have dreams. I was an all-city running back and I was gonna run out of here to college. To suburbs. Now the only thing I use a football for is as a toilet.
altHero: Tracy Jordan as D’Jeffrey “Lucky” Seeda, walking down the street and holding a football
alt1: closeup of the football with a big hole cut out of it
alt2: Lucky laying on the ground next to an overturned wheelchair
alt3: a family sits on a couch looking sad, the grandma wipes a tear
alt4: two cops at the front door
